content: {A抱歉}You'll find it just <style=Highlight>on the left as you enter the Omni-Gallery</style>. Inside, you'll find a few small gifts that I've prepared. I'm really looking forward to your visit!
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A思考}While building the new tanks, I had a bit of a tussle — um, negotiation, with my moon crab that was hiding in the mop. We nearly shattered all of the glass...
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: As you can see, I've taken care of those aquatic creatures you gave me. I've set up artificial habitats for them that match their needs perfectly.
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: A windfall is best when shared. So <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, don't hold back. Please take the Dough that's on this black card.
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}I've compiled my experience in crafting the tanks within the Aquarium and recorded it onto these <style=Highlight>Inspo Cards</style>. I believe they may be of use to you... Here...
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A惊讶}<style=SizeBig>It actually fell out of the mop.</style>
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3
参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A挠头}Is this what they call a... windfall? <style=SizeSmall>Even though it's my own money...</style>
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: So I simply withdrew the funds from it and expanded the Omni-Gallery with a modest annex — the <style=Highlight>Giftarium</style>.
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: What's more, while wrestling — ahem, negotiating, with my moon crab, I happened upon a black card I thought I'd lost quite some time ago...
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: While making the withdrawal, I accidentally discovered another account... along with a rather inexplicable amount of accrued interest.
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: But thankfully, all ended without incident. All Eco-Tanks are now operational, and the creatures seem well adjusted to their new homes.
info: 参观水族馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3
